description:
* Ability: Unknown
He has an I.Q. of 179, but strangely, even though he has a high I.Q., he is constantly outsmarted by Ai. He also has the talent of calculating. He named his glasses Bianca, after falling in love with them during his fight with Ai.
Mori suspects he is a pervert, but he denies these claims and states that he has an I.Q of 179 as a counter.
Mori defeated Kilnorton using her I.Q. Kilnorton`s ability was not revealed during the series. At the end of the anime,he still falls in love with his glasses without Ai using her power on him, and mutters "Glasses...glasses...glasses...", creeping Ai out.
name: Kilnorton
